description: React component implementing a Tic Tac Toe game with game logic, UI rendering, state management, scoring, and styling.

methods.name: computeStatus
methods.description: Calculates the current game status (in progress, won, or draw) based on the board state and next player.

methods.name: otherPlayer
methods.description: Returns the other player ('X' or 'O') given the current player.

methods.name: getStatusText
methods.description: Returns a human-readable string representing the current game status.

methods.name: getSubtitleText
methods.description: Returns a subtitle prompt based on current game status.

methods.name: squareLabel
methods.description: Generates a label for a square based on its index (e.g., 'Row 1, Column 1').

methods.name: TicTacToeApp
methods.description: Main React functional component managing the Tic Tac Toe game UI, game logic, state, and styles.
